/** * Is product in a pack? * * @static * @param $id_product * @return bool */

subNode:value.scalar:string: SELECT p.*, product_shop.*, pl.*, MAX(image_shop.`id_image`) id_image, il.`legend`, cl.`name` AS category_default, a.quantity AS pack_quantity, product_shop.`id_category_default`, a.id_product_pack FROM `
product` p ON p.id_product = a.id_product_item LEFT JOIN `
product_lang` pl ON p.id_product = pl.id_product AND pl.`id_lang` =
image_lang` il ON (i.`id_image` = il.`id_image` AND il.`id_lang` =
category_lang` cl ON product_shop.`id_category_default` = cl.`id_category` AND cl.`id_lang` =
